articles.title: NewJaisa Technologies IPO opens for subscription tomorrow - Hindustan Times
articles.description: NewJaisa Tecnologies aims to raise ₹39.93 crore through its IPO. The issue will close for subscription on September 27.
articles.content: IT electronics refurbishing firm NewJaisa Technologies's initial public offering (IPO) will be open for subscription on Monday, i.e September 25. The company aims to raise 39.93 crore through its IPO… [+2063 chars]
